Input:
FRETREE Sports Water Bottle 1L, BPA Free Tritan Non-Toxic Plastic Drinking Bottle, Leakproof Design for Teenager, Adult, Sports, Gym, Fitness, Outdoor, Cycling, School & Office
Colour Matte Grey
Material Plastic
Capacity 1 litres
Brand FRETREE
[100% Safe & Odorless Material] Made of Eastman Tritan copolyester, all our water bottles are totally BPA-free and non-toxic, quenching your thirst with odorless water as well as a glass one can provide. Tritan also gives the extra durability withstanding accidental shocks and temperatures vary from -10°C to 96°C.
[360° Leakproof Design] This water bottle employs a 3-stage leakproof design: a silicone sealing ring prevents leakage in the screw area; two silicone dot pads seal the nozzle and air vent when the lid is closed; a safety lock prevents accident opening the lid. Comes with extra dot pads for spare use and a complimentary sponge brush for your convenience.
[Humanization in Every Detail] By just one press, the lid opens immediately and its anti-rebound design ensures your using safety. Built-in with a removable filter, you can always enjoy drinking and avoid chock by ice cubes, fruits, or tea leaves. The air vent balances the barometric pressure, making water flow into your mouth fluently.
[Portable for Multiple Activities] The 1L capacity achieves a perfect balance between utility and portability. With a carry loop, you can go for both indoor and outdoor exercises with it, including cycling, running, camping, hiking, yoga, treadmill, etc. Its compact size also fits your backpack and bike bottle holder perfectly.
[Ideal Gift for Families & Friends] As hydration helps boost our metabolism, this water bottle becomes an ideal gift option for families and friends.

Input:
OMORC Stainless Steel Water Bottle 1000ml/600ml【5 Layers Powerful Insulated Vacuum Flask】 Keeps Hot to 14Hrs,Cold to 28+Hrs,BPA-Free Reusable Drink Flask,Portable & Leak-Proof with Neoprene Sleeve
Colour Black
Material Stainless Steel
Capacity 600 Millilitres
Brand OMORC
316 Stainless Steel: The interior wall of our vacuum cup is made of 316 medical grade steel, which greatly outperforms 314 food grade steel in anti-oxidation, corrosion resistance and temperature retention. Thus, it’s a healthier choice for containing your beverage, such as tea, coffee, cold drink with ice cubes, etc. Further, it won’t retain or transfer flavours, giving you pure taste of your drink.
Outstanding Insulation: Featured 5 walls, this vacuum cup can greatly protect the liquid compartment from the hot or cold outside. The premium coated copper on the exterior of the inner wall contributes to added insulation, achieving in reducing temperature transmission in maximum. Thus, our product can keep liquid hot up to 14 hours and cold up to 24 hours, which is longer than other insulated bottles.
Leak Proof & Anti-sweat: The BPA-free silicone rubber on each cap ensures no leak even the bottle is tipped over or shaken. And you can put our vacuum cup in your bag freely without worrying about wetting other items. Coated with high-quality powder outside, the bottle is anti-slip and scratch-resistant, and also prevents condensation from forming on the outside wall.
Easy to Carry: Both of the two interchangeable caps have a hoop, which provides convenience for carrying the bottle with your hand or hanging it on your backpack. Presented a soft cup holder with adjustable strap, with which you can hang our product on your neck like a messenger bag, offering fitting comfort as well as being a fashion ornament. Perfectly suitable for daily use, running, hiking, camping, etc.
What You Get: Comes with a sport cap for effortless drinking from the bottle without removing the cap; a loop cap for quicker drinking and more convenient carrying; two straws for changing and washing; a soft cup holder for cup protection and carrying convenience; a cup brush and a straw brush for easy washing. 100% satisfaction guarantee: 45 days hassle free money back, 2 .

Input:
Polar Gear Aqua Grip Bottle – BPA-Free Reusable Sports Water Bottle & Foldable Straw – Drink at the Gym, in the Car & Outdoors – Clear Tritan Plastic & Dishwasher Safe – Black, 650ml
Colour Black
Material Tritan
Capacity 650 Millilitres
Brand Polar Gear
HYDRATE WITH YOUR FAVOURITE DRINK: The extra-wide neck and screw top makes for easy filling, cleaning and emptying of your drinks bottle; whether you add ice cubes, water, or even fruit, this bottle has the capacity for it all. Great gift idea for keeping your loved ones cool and hydrated, and with no plastic taste, the BPA free bottle makes sure whatever drink you have tastes fresh.
A SMART BOTTLE YOU'LL NEVER LOSE: It’s only too easy to leave your water bottle somewhere when your day is busy. The integrated carry hoop gives you the option of attaching your Aqua Grip Tritan bottle to your bag for extra security or carrying on-the-go so you can keep your bottle from disappearing. With a contoured hardy body for extra grip, you'll never drop and break it either!
SAVE TIME & ENERGY: The hassle-free built-in flip-top lid can open the bottle with a single finger, so it's a breeze to take a sip out of if you’re thirsty when working out or driving. There’s also no need to tip your head back when sipping so this bottle is great for keeping safe and not losing focus. When flipped down, the straw closes the lid, and the silicone band seals it, preventing spillage.
UBER FUNCTIONAL: Super lightweight at 120 grams with a detachable internal straw, you can pop in the drink of your choice and away you go. The bottle fits into most standard bike and car drink holders. Safer and less breakable than glass bottles, this 650ml capacity bottle is made of Tritan (sturdy washable polypropylene plastic) and is perfect for reaching your daily hydration goals whether you are going to the gym, doing yoga, travelling or even relaxing in the hot tub.
ECO-FRIENDLY & REUSABLE: Save the equivalent of 1460 plastic water bottles from getting tossed into a landfill by coaching the next generation into using a reusable water bottle. Helping the planet has never been so easy… or so sleek!

When flipped down, the straw closes the lid, and the silicone band seals it, preventing spillage.
UBER FUNCTIONAL: Super lightweight at 120 grams with a detachable internal straw, you can pop in the drink of your choice and away you go. The bottle fits into most standard bike and car drink holders. Safer and less breakable than glass bottles, this 650ml capacity bottle is made of Tritan (sturdy washable polypropylene plastic) and is perfect for reaching your daily hydration goals whether you are going to the gym, doing yoga, travelling or even relaxing in the hot tub.
ECO-FRIENDLY & REUSABLE: Save the equivalent of 1460 plastic water bottles from getting tossed into a landfill by coaching the next generation into using a reusable water bottle. Helping the planet has never been so easy… or so sleek!

Polar Gear Aqua Style Bottle – Pattern Water Bottle & Straw – Leakproof & Dishwasher Safe – Sports, Eco-Friendly, Indoors or Outdoors – Lightweight Tritan & BPA Free – 700ml

HYDRATE WITH YOUR FAVOURITE DRINK: The extra-wide neck, detachable straw and easy to use screw top makes for quick filling, cleaning and emptying of your drinks bottle; whether you add ice cubes, water, or even fruit this bottle has the capacity for it all. Great gift idea for keeping your loved ones cool and hydrated, and with no plastic taste, the BPA free product makes sure the water tastes fresh.
A SMART BOTTLE YOU'LL NEVER LOSE: It’s only too easy to leave your water bottle somewhere when your day is busy. The integrated carry hoop gives you the option of attaching your drink to your bag for extra security or carrying on-the-go so you can keep your bottle from disappearing.
SAVE TIME & ENERGY: The Hassle-free built-in flip-top lid can open the bottle with a single finger, so it's a breeze to take a sip out of if you’re thirsty when working out or driving. There’s also no need to tip your head back when sipping due to the smart air valve, so this bottle is great for keeping safe and not losing focus. When flipped down, the straw closes the lid, preventing spillage.
UBER FUNCTIONAL: Lightweight at 108 grams with a sturdy internal straw, you can pop in the drink of your choice and away you go. The bottle fits into most standard bike and car drink holders. Safer and less breakable than glass bottles, this 700ml capacity bottle is made of Tritan (sturdy washable polypropylene plastic), perfect for reaching your daily hydration goals whether you are going to the gym, doing yoga, travelling or even relaxing in the hot tub.
ECO-FRIENDLY & REUSABLE: Save the equivalent of 1460 plastic water bottles from getting tossed into a landfill by coaching the next generation into using a reusable water bottle. Helping the planet has never been so easy… or such a nice shade of green!

Input:
Hydrate 2.One BPA Free Water Bottle with Straw & Motivational Time Markers | Leakproof Sports Bottle for Camping Workouts Gym & Outdoor Activity | 750ml
Colour Pink
Material Plastic
Brand HYDRATE 2.ONE
WE HATE SPILLS AND WET BAGS - We really hate it, as much as you do. Our improved water bottles with straw are designed with an innovative detachable lid, in which a silicone has been attached to prevent leaks. The food grade silicone helps screw-on the cap carefully without additional pressure. This makes the closure easier even for children. The nozzle lets it close by falling back on the silicone bung in the middle of the lid, enabling the bottle to be 100% leak-proof when upside down.
ZERO TOXIN, WE KEEP YOU SAFE - We have been making drinks bottles since 2016 and SAFETY is our #1 priority, so we chose Tritan for the manufacture of our bottles for the following reasons: Compared with PC and PP materials, Tritan material is a BPA Free plastic - It does not contain Bisphenol A (BPA) or other bisphenol compounds. It is also resistant to dirt and is not prone to odour. It's completely safe to use.
THE BOTTLE RESISTS KNOCKOUTS - The Sports water bottle is tough. We wanted to make sure that the reusable water bottle is absolutely durable and we have chosen Eastman Tritan Material. Tritan is much lighter than glass, stronger than plastic - making it easier to handle without the fear of breaking. Dropped it from the stairs ? Fill it with hot water ? Freezer or dishwasher safe ? No problem, said the engineer. Our 2 Kids have done further tests successfully. You sure need to test it yourself
DRINK MORE WATER, STAY HEALTHY - While everyone knows that it’s important to stay hydrated, doing so can be difficult at times. With our unique motivational time markings this water bottle is great for building your new hydration habit, meaning you’ll significantly increase your daily water intake with smaller but consistent amounts throughout the day. With Hydrate 2.One staying hydrated has never been so easy.
AN OCEAN FRIENDLY TEAM - By using one of our water bottles you are part of the era without plastic and ugly disposable scrap in oceans. Our Manufacturer is registered with the Food and Drug Administration (FDA approved), we are Carbon neutral too. Our bottles are SGS tested and therefore free from products harmful to health and the environment, reusable and easy to recycle and without pollution. Investing in this water bottle is like investing in the Earth's future

ZOUNICH Sports Water Bottle Kids with Times to Drink Leakproof 1.2L / 1L / 700ml / 500ml 1Litre Drink Bottles BPA Free Motivational Adults, Gym, School, Running, Travel, Girls, Boys Filter Reusable
Colour Black
Material BPA Free Tritan
Capacity 500 Millilitres
Brand ZOUNICH
🌴BPA-FREE & ECO-FRIENDLY – Here at ZOUNICH we wanted to make sure that the reusable water bottle is absolutely SAFE to use on a daily basis. We have used 100% US imported BPA-free, nontoxic and phthalate free Tritan hard plastic. This has superior impact resistance to bumps all while retaining a light weight! As a food grade material, it also guarantees a pure taste and, additionally, we supply a spare food grade silicone seal for free!
🚴DURABLE & ONE-HAND OPERATION – Our ZOUNICH sports water bottles are tough, durable and shatterproof. Its ergonomic design features a quick thumb button release and locking system, so you never have to fumble with a screw off cap again! It has an improved hidden metal spring which prevents the cap from making contact with your face while drinking. This makes the bottle ideal for cycling, climbing, hiking, running and any other gym and outdoor activities.
💧100% LEAK PROOF – The bottle has an ergonomic flip cap, which opens with only one click. It has a practical nozzle which allows you to get a fast water flow. When you're done with your workout, the triple food grade silicone seals the bottle shut to enable a 100% leak-proof and dirt-proof containment. It is available in Four sizes which is suitable for most bottle holders and backpacks. It’s also perfect for both HOT and COLD liquids [-10℃ to 96℃]
❤️STURDY HANDLE & FRUIT INFUSER – There is a filter on the top which is great for fruit or ice cube infusions, such as lemon, mint or any other fruit you wish to use. It has a wide mouth opening so it is easy to fill with ice/fruit and it makes cleaning much easier. The sturdy strap allows you carry it anywhere. DOUBLE WALL - This bottle is crafted with double walls, the only bottle out there with inside and outside stainless steel. Beverage will be kept hot for up to 12 hours, and cold for up to 24! The double wall feature prevents condensation and burns, retaining the temperature of your beverage.
TRIPLE LIDS - The drinking bottle is equipped with three individual lids to serve all your needs. Use the one with the mouthpiece for sipping hot drinks, the one with the straw is just right for cold beverages, and the removable lid is what you need for drinks containing ice or fruit.
LEAKPROOF and SHATTERPROOF - The bottle is absolutely leakproof and shatter resistant making it the choice for rough and tumble use. Perfect for hiking, biking, boating, the gym, work, school, and home. The bottle is safe in backpacks, beach bags, or the edge of your countertop.
PREMIUM STAINLESS STEEL - Protect the environment and your own health by daring the switchover from plastic to stainless. Our drinking bottles are produced of superior 18/8 stainless steel, free of BPA or any other toxins. They last an average of 12 years and won’t grow mold or retain previous flavors.
TRAVEL FREINDLY - The bottle fits cup holders, the choice for your coffee en route to work, long road trips, and boat excursions. A built-in handle enables you to carry it with ease or attach it to a backpack and the large capacity makes it perfect for when you are hiking, biking, camping, or running.

Moon Bottles - Stainless Steel Metal Water Bottle & Vacuum Flask - 24 Hrs Cold & 12 Hot - Insulated Drinks Bottles, Double Walled Reusable Water Bottles, BPA Free, Leakproof (260ml, Pastel Red)
Colour Pastel Red
Brand Moon bottles
Material Stainless Steel, Metal
Item weight 200 Grams
Item dimensions L x W x H 20 x 6 x 6 millimetres
WHY GO TO THE MOON (BOTTLE)? - Want access to hot or cold water all day with a fully tested, guaranteed insulated bottle you'll be proud to show off? We're a boutique UK brand, so can charge less for bottles made from the highest grades of 18/8 stainless steel. We also treat our customers like family, offering the best customer service and a money back guarantee. Don't take the chance on cheaper versions or pay more to cover the costs of a bigger business. Instead, shoot for the moon (bottle)
***LIFETIME WARRANTY*** We're so confident in the high quality of our premium stainless steel water bottles that if you're not fully satisfied with your product, get in contact with us and we'll offer you a full refund, no questions asked - This is our 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. Every moon bottle has to complete our rigorous "NASA-style" testing process, so you can purchase with the confidence that it will actually keep your fluids COLD FOR 24 HOURS, HOT FOR 12 HOURS.
ECO FRIENDLY, BPA FREE DESIGN - By drinking out of a refillable metal bottle, you may never buy a single-use water bottle ever again. Every moon bottle is 100% BPA Free, Phthalate Free and a great way to reduce the demand for single use plastics that end up in our oceans or landfills. When testing this bottle type, we found that the base was the most prone to scratches with daily use. So we purposely don't coat the base to keep the bottles looking brand new, for as long as possible
DOUBLE WALLED, VACUUM SEALED TECHNOLOGY - Want access to ice cold or piping hot fluids all day long? Our advanced double walled metallic construction means the temperature inside each stainless steel water bottle will not be effected by the unpredictable British weather! The smart vacuum sealed non leak lid means you can put the drink bottle in your bag with the confidence that every moon bottle has been fully tested and certified to be 100% LEAK PROOF
BEST WATER BOTTLE FOR EVERY SITUATION - Available in a variety of colours you'll be proud to show off, every moon bottle also comes in a free gift box, so makes the perfect present for women, men, girls, boys, adults kids..everyone! Can be used to hydrate for travel, work, gym, camping, sports, in the car, relaxing at home..everywhere! Can be used for water, tea, coffee..everything! Will even fit into car cup holders and the opening is large enough for ice cubes, for icy cold water all day long

【Longer Temperature Retention】OMORC sports water bottle keeps your beverages cold for 28hrs and hot for 14hrs. 5-layer insulation craft especially the double-wall insulated technology and inner copper coated layer effectively stop heat conduction and radiation and increase the insulation duration. Note: Please use Insulated Flex Cap for better insulation effect.
【2021 New Flex Cap】OMORC flex cap is uniquely designed with a patented thumb-based ergonomic handle. You can place your thumb naturally and comfortably on the handle. Moreover, it helps distribute the gripping stress of your fingers, providing comfortable and effortless carrying experience. 100% leakproof and no wetting worries during transport.
【18/10 Stainless Steel】OMORC double-wall vacuum insulated water bottle is crafted with 18/10 stainless steel liner to provide better corrosion resistance, oxidation resistance, rust resistance, temperature retention and water scaling prevention than ordinary 18/8 stainless steel, keeping the pure taste of your beverages to the last drop. It also won’t retain or transfer flavor.
【Convenient & Portable】Frosted surface ensures sweat-free & anti-slip grip and one-handed refreshment. Wide mouth allows for easy clean and ice cube filling. BPA-free straw lid and flex cap with portable handle are easy to carry for various outdoor activities. The bottle pouch with adjustable belt is built for hands-free carrying and added bottle protection.
【100% Satisfaction Guarantee】OMORC stainless steel water bottle provides perfect solution to everyday refreshment and healthy hydration. You will get 1 40oz insulated water bottle, 1 portable pouch, 2 lids, 2 straws, 1 bottle brush and 1 straw brush. We offer 1-year warranty and lifetime service for no-risk experience. Input:
HYDRATE 2.ONE BPA Free Water Bottle with Straw & Motivational Time Markers | Leakproof Sports Bottle for Camping Workouts Gym & Outdoor Activity | 750ml (Black)
Colour Black
Material Tritan
Capacity 750 Millilitres
Brand HYDRATE 2.ONE
WE HATE SPILLS AND WET BAGS - We really hate it, as much as you do. Our improved water bottles with straw are designed with an innovative detachable lid, in which a silicone has been attached to prevent leaks. The food grade silicone helps screw-on the cap carefully without additional pressure. This makes the closure easier even for children. The nozzle lets it close by falling back on the silicone bung in the middle of the lid, enabling the bottle to be 100% leak-proof when upside down.
ZERO TOXIN, WE KEEP YOU SAFE - We have been making drinks bottles since 2016 and SAFETY is our #1 priority, so we chose Tritan for the manufacture of our bottles for the following reasons: Compared with PC and PP materials, Tritan material is a BPA Free plastic - It does not contain Bisphenol A (BPA) or other bisphenol compounds. It is also resistant to dirt and is not prone to odour. It's completely safe to use.
THE BOTTLE RESISTS KNOCKOUTS - The Sports water bottle is tough. We wanted to make sure that the reusable water bottle is absolutely durable and we have chosen Eastman Tritan Material. Tritan is much lighter than glass, stronger than plastic - making it easier to handle without the fear of breaking. Dropped it from the stairs ? Fill it with hot water ? Freezer or dishwasher safe ? No problem, said the engineer. Our 2 Kids have done further tests successfully. You sure need to test it yourself
DRINK MORE WATER, STAY HEALTHY - While everyone knows that it’s important to stay hydrated, doing so can be difficult at times. With our unique motivational time markings this water bottle is great for building your new hydration habit, meaning you’ll significantly increase your daily water intake with smaller but consistent amounts throughout the day. With Hydrate 2.One staying hydrated has never been so easy.
AN OCEAN FRIENDLY TEAM - By using one of our water bottles you are part of the era without plastic and ugly disposable scrap in oceans. Our Manufacturer is registered with the Food and Drug Administration (FDA approved), we are Carbon neutral too. Our bottles are SGS tested and therefore free from products harmful to health and the environment, reusable and easy to recycle and without pollution. Investing in this water bottle is like investing in the Earth's future

Best Sports Water Bottle Leak Proof 1L/700ml/500ml/400ml BPA Free Tritan Drink Bottles|Kids,Adults,Gym,School,Sport,Cycling| with Times to Drink & Fruit Infuser Filter & Lock Cover|BPA Free Reusable Large
Colour Black

🌴BPA FREE & ECO-FRIENDLY--Here at ZOUNICH we wanted to make sure that the reusable water bottle is absolutely SAFE to use on a daily basis. We have used 100% US imported BPA free, nontoxic and phthalate free Tritan hard plastic, which with superior impact is resistance to Bumps and more lighter for everyone to use! The food graded material also guarantees a pure taste and we supply a spare food graded silicone seal for free.
🚴DURABLE & ONE-HAND OPERATION--Our ZOUNICH sports water bottle are tough, durable and shatterproof. Its ergonomic design features a thumb button release and locking system, You never need to fumble with a screw off cap again! It has an improved hidden metal spring which prevents the cap touching face when are drinking. It makes it ideal for cycling、climbing、hiking、running or any outdoor activities. Each bottle comes in a FREE Gift Box so will make a great present!
💧100% LEAK PROOF--The bottle has an Ergonomically flip cap, which opens with only one click, It has a practical nozzle which allows you to get a fast water flow. When you're done with our workout the triple food grade silicone seal, lock the bottle to enable it to be 100% leak-proof and dirt-proof. It is an ideal companion for adults, elderly & kids. It is available in Four sizes which is suitable for most bottle holders and backpacks. Perfect for HOT and COLD liquids between [ -10℃-96℃].
❤️STURDY HANDLE & FRUIT INFUSER--There is a filter on the top which is great for fruit or ice cube infuser, such as lemons，mint or whatever fruit you wish to use. It has wide mouth opening so it is easy to fill with ice, fruit, and makes cleaning much easier. The sturdy strap allows you carry it anywhere. It has an air hole to help carbonated or hot drinks eliminate carbon dioxide and steam. The practical motivational volumetric markings will remind you when it's time to chug some more water.
🎁LIFETIME GUARANTEE--Its modern and elegant design is bound to turn a few heads-wherever you go. We promise our quality inspection departments will make a strict inspection to all our products before shipping. It has been professionally tested and compared to 10 other brand bottles and it performs better than any other water bottle.If for any reason our product doesn't meet your standards, just email us 7*24h for a prompt replacement or a full refund.

Input:
HYDRATE 2.ONE BPA Free Water Bottle with Straw & Motivational Time Markers | Leakproof Sports Bottle for Camping Workouts Gym & Outdoor Activity | 750ml (Teal)
Colour Teal
Material Tritan
Capacity 750 Millilitres
Brand HYDRATE 2.ONE
WE HATE SPILLS AND WET BAGS - We really hate it, as much as you do. Our improved water bottles with straw are designed with an innovative detachable lid, in which a silicone has been attached to prevent leaks. The food grade silicone helps screw-on the cap carefully without additional pressure. This makes the closure easier even for children. The nozzle lets it close by falling back on the silicone bung in the middle of the lid, enabling the bottle to be 100% leak-proof when upside down.
ZERO TOXIN, WE KEEP YOU SAFE - We have been making drinks bottles since 2016 and SAFETY is our #1 priority, so we chose Tritan for the manufacture of our bottles for the following reasons: Compared with PC and PP materials, Tritan material is a BPA Free plastic - It does not contain Bisphenol A (BPA) or other bisphenol compounds. It is also resistant to dirt and is not prone to odour. It's completely safe to use.
THE BOTTLE RESISTS KNOCKOUTS - The Sports water bottle is tough. We wanted to make sure that the reusable water bottle is absolutely durable and we have chosen Eastman Tritan Material. Tritan is much lighter than glass, stronger than plastic - making it easier to handle without the fear of breaking. Dropped it from the stairs ? Fill it with hot water ? Freezer or dishwasher safe ? No problem, said the engineer. Our 2 Kids have done further tests successfully. You sure need to test it yourself
DRINK MORE WATER, STAY HEALTHY - While everyone knows that it’s important to stay hydrated, doing so can be difficult at times. With our unique motivational time markings this water bottle is great for building your new hydration habit, meaning you’ll significantly increase your daily water intake with smaller but consistent amounts throughout the day. With Hydrate 2.One staying hydrated has never been so easy.
AN OCEAN FRIENDLY TEAM - By using one of our water bottles you are part of the era without plastic and ugly disposable scrap in oceans. Our Manufacturer is registered with the Food and Drug Administration (FDA approved), we are Carbon neutral too. Our bottles are SGS tested and therefore free from products harmful to health and the environment, reusable and easy to recycle and without pollution. Investing in this water bottle is like investing in the Earth's future

OMORC Stainless Steel Sports Water Bottle,1200ml/40ozl BPA Free Vacuum Insulated Drink Bottle,28h Cold/14h Hot,Leakproof,Wide Mouth Thermo Metal Flask for Gym,School,Travel,Camping,Fitness+Straw Lid
Colour Green
Material Stainless Steel
Brand OMORC
【Longer Temperature Retention】OMORC sports water bottle keeps your beverages cold for 28hrs and hot for 14hrs. 5-layer insulation craft especially the double-wall insulated technology and inner copper coated layer effectively stop heat conduction and radiation and increase the insulation duration. Note: Please use Insulated Flex Cap for better insulation effect.
【2021 New Flex Cap】OMORC flex cap is uniquely designed with a patented thumb-based ergonomic handle. You can place your thumb naturally and comfortably on the handle. Moreover, it helps distribute the gripping stress of your fingers, providing comfortable and effortless carrying experience. 100% leakproof and no wetting worries during transport.
【18/10 Stainless Steel】OMORC double-wall vacuum insulated water bottle is crafted with 18/10 stainless steel liner to provide better corrosion resistance, oxidation resistance, rust resistance, temperature retention and water scaling prevention than ordinary 18/8 stainless steel, keeping the pure taste of your beverages to the last drop. It also won’t retain or transfer flavor.
【Convenient & Portable】Frosted surface ensures sweat-free & anti-slip grip and one-handed refreshment. Wide mouth allows for easy clean and ice cube filling. BPA-free straw lid and flex cap with portable handle are easy to carry for various outdoor activities. The bottle pouch with adjustable belt is built for hands-free carrying and added bottle protection.
【100% Satisfaction Guarantee】OMORC stainless steel water bottle provides perfect solution to everyday refreshment and healthy hydration. You will get 1 40oz insulated water bottle, 1 portable pouch, 2 lids, 2 straws, 1 bottle brush and 1 straw brush. We offer 1-year warranty and lifetime service for no-risk experience. If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us.

WE HATE SPILLS AND WET BAGS - We really hate it, as much as you do. Our improved water bottles with straw are designed with an innovative detachable lid, in which a silicone has been attached to prevent leaks. The food grade silicone helps screw-on the cap carefully without additional pressure. This makes the closure easier even for children. The nozzle lets it close by falling back on the silicone bung in the middle of the lid, enabling the bottle to be 100% leak-proof when upside down.
ZERO TOXIN, WE KEEP YOU SAFE - We have been making drinks bottles since 2016 and SAFETY is our #1 priority, so we chose Tritan for the manufacture of our bottles for the following reasons: Compared with PC and PP materials, Tritan material is a BPA Free plastic - It does not contain Bisphenol A (BPA) or other bisphenol compounds. It is also resistant to dirt and is not prone to odour. It's completely safe to use.
THE BOTTLE RESISTS KNOCKOUTS - The Sports water bottle is tough. We wanted to make sure that the reusable water bottle is absolutely durable and we have chosen Eastman Tritan Material. Tritan is much lighter than glass, stronger than plastic - making it easier to handle without the fear of breaking. Dropped it from the stairs ? Fill it with hot water ? Freezer or dishwasher safe ? No problem, said the engineer. Our 2 Kids have done further tests successfully. You sure need to test it yourself
DRINK MORE WATER, STAY HEALTHY - While everyone knows that it’s important to stay hydrated, doing so can be difficult at times. With our unique motivational time markings this water bottle is great for building your new hydration habit, meaning you’ll significantly increase your daily water intake with smaller but consistent amounts throughout the day. With Hydrate 2.One staying hydrated has never been so easy.
AN OCEAN FRIENDLY TEAM - By using one of our water bottles you are part of the era without plastic and ugly disposable scrap in oceans. Our Manufacturer is registered with the Food and Drug Administration (FDA approved), we are Carbon neutral too. Our bottles are SGS tested and therefore free from products harmful to health and the environment, reusable and easy to recycle and without pollution. Investing in this water bottle is like investing in the Earth's future

Polar Gear Water Tracker Bottle – Measure Hydration & Set Drinking Goals At Home Or On The Go – Leakproof, BPA Free & Dishwasher Safe – With Straw – For the Gym/Car & Outdoors – Mint Green, 750ml
Colour Mint
Material Eastman Tritan
Capacity 750 Millilitres
Brand Polar Gear
ENCOURAGE YOURSELF TO DRINK MORE WATER: Polar Gear’s Water Tracker Bottle with detachable straw is great to keep you hydrated. Available in bright pink/berry, mint green, navy blue, dusty pink and black with inspiring motivational messages that serve as a reminder to stay on track for drinking with handy hourly markers down the side of the bottle. This bottle will help you to stay healthy and quench your thirst. Each design is different, so grab one for all the family to keep cool this year!
A SMART BOTTLE YOU'LL NEVER LOSE: It’s only too easy to leave your bottle somewhere when you're busy. Use the integrated carry hoop to hook onto your bag and never lose your water bottle again. Our flip-up straw opens with one finger, so it's easy to sip when working out or driving. You don't have to tip your head back when sipping due to the smart air valve, so this bottle is great for keeping safe and not losing focus. Flip the straw to close the secure silicone seal lid and prevent spillage.
HYDRATE WITH YOUR FAVOURITE DRINK: The extra-wide neck and screw top makes for easy filling, cleaning and emptying of your drinks bottle; whether you add ice cubes, water, or even fruit, this water tracker bottle has the capacity for it all. Great gift idea for keeping your loved ones cool and hydrated, and with no plastic taste, the BPA free bottle makes sure whatever drink you have tastes fresh.
UBER FUNCTIONAL: Super lightweight with a detachable internal straw, you can pop in the drink of your choice and away you go. The bottle fits into most standard bike and car drink holders. Safer and less breakable than glass bottles, this 750ml capacity bottle is made of Tritan (sturdy washable polypropylene plastic) and is perfect for reaching your daily hydration goals whether you are going to the gym, doing yoga, travelling or even relaxing in the hot tub.
ECO-FRIENDLY & REUSABLE: Save the equivalent of 1460 plastic water bottles from getting tossed into a landfill by coaching the next generation into using a reusable water bottle. Helping the planet has never been so easy… or this shade of green!

This bottle will help you to stay healthy and quench your thirst. Each design is different, so grab one for all the family to keep cool this year!
A SMART BOTTLE YOU'LL NEVER LOSE: It’s only too easy to leave your bottle somewhere when you're busy. Use the integrated carry hoop to hook onto your bag and never lose your water bottle again. Our flip-up straw opens with one finger, so it's easy to sip when working out or driving. You don't have to tip your head back when sipping due to the smart air valve, so this bottle is great for keeping safe and not losing focus. Flip the straw to close the secure silicone seal lid and prevent spillage.
HYDRATE WITH YOUR FAVOURITE DRINK: The extra-wide neck and screw top makes for easy filling, cleaning and emptying of your drinks bottle; whether you add ice cubes, water, or even fruit, this water tracker bottle has the capacity for it all. Great gift idea for keeping your loved ones cool and hydrated, and with no plastic taste, the BPA free bottle makes sure whatever drink you have tastes fresh.
UBER FUNCTIONAL: Super lightweight with a detachable internal straw, you can pop in the drink of your choice and away you go. The bottle fits into most standard bike and car drink holders. Safer and less breakable than glass bottles, this 750ml capacity bottle is made of Tritan (sturdy washable polypropylene plastic) and is perfect for reaching your daily hydration goals whether you are going to the gym, doing yoga, travelling or even relaxing in the hot tub.
ECO-FRIENDLY & REUSABLE: Save the equivalent of 1460 plastic water bottles from getting tossed into a landfill by coaching the next generation into using a reusable water bottle. Helping the planet has never been so easy… or this shade of green!

The water bottle is double-walled and made from high quality food grade 18/8 stainless steel that will not break. The exterior of the vacuum sealed area is dipped in copper for added insulation. Copper reduces the transfer of temperature, adding even more insulation to your bottle.
Wide mouth makes it easy to clean, BPA-free lid which means they are very safe. Patent Design. New straw lid with wide rotating handle makes drinking easier and more convenient. which can effectively prevent dust from entering, and avoid touching the nozzle by hand.
Take this easy to carry portable water bottle while hiking, biking, shopping or leave it at the office. The insulated water bottle is a great gift for any occasion.

THE HEALTHY WAY TO DRINK WATER - Our water bottle with straw and time markings are BPA free No toxins and eco friendly. The material we use for our bottle is Tritan from the USA. Once you have used the water bottle daily for hiking, walking or camping the straw will need a clean, we have provided extra replacement straws so more hygenic for you
LONGER LASTING WATER BOTTLE - EXTRA FREE STRAW & CLEANING BRUSH - we have made it as easy as possible to get the most out of your bottle by including a free brush and extra straws in case you need to replace a broken straw. Colour Turquoise
Material Tritan
Capacity 650 Millilitres
Brand Polar Gear
HYDRATE WITH YOUR FAVOURITE DRINK: The extra-wide neck and screw top makes for easy filling, cleaning and emptying of your drinks bottle; whether you add ice cubes, water, or even fruit, this bottle has the capacity for it all. Great gift idea for keeping your loved ones cool and hydrated, and with no plastic taste, the BPA free bottle makes sure whatever drink you have tastes fresh.
A SMART BOTTLE YOU'LL NEVER LOSE: It’s only too easy to leave your water bottle somewhere when your day is busy. The integrated carry hoop gives you the option of attaching your Aqua Grip Tritan bottle to your bag for extra security or carrying on-the-go so you can keep your bottle from disappearing. With a contoured hardy body for extra grip, you'll never drop and break it either!
SAVE TIME & ENERGY: The hassle-free built-in flip-top lid can open the bottle with a single finger, so it's a breeze to take a sip out of if you’re thirsty when working out or driving. There’s also no need to tip your head back when sipping so this bottle is great for keeping safe and not losing focus. When flipped down, the straw closes the lid, and the silicone band seals it, preventing spillage.
UBER FUNCTIONAL: Super lightweight at 120 grams with a detachable internal straw, you can pop in the drink of your choice and away you go. The bottle fits into most standard bike and car drink holders. Safer and less breakable than glass bottles, this 650ml capacity bottle is made of Tritan (sturdy washable polypropylene plastic) and is perfect for reaching your daily hydration goals whether you are going to the gym, doing yoga, travelling or even relaxing in the hot tub.
ECO-FRIENDLY & REUSABLE: Save the equivalent of 1460 plastic water bottles from getting tossed into a landfill by coaching the next generation into using a reusable water bottle. Helping the planet has never been so easy… or this shade of green!

EASY DRINK FLASK: Flip straw tip with one hand and sip without spilling or splashing. Hydrate your body by drinking water the easy and fun way. Use this 750 ml vacuum bottle at home, taking to school, work, in your car, sports, camping, traveling, at the beach or going on holiday with! Fill it with water, coffee, tea, milk, juice or other drinks. It fits in all regular cup holders. The cap has a buckle that adds to convenience for carrying the bottle in your hand or hanging it on your backpack
VACUUM INSULATED WATER BOTTLE: This thermos bottle is made of stainless steel and ultra modern insulation technology that maintains temperatures inside regardless of the temperature outside— maintains temperature and keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours and hot for up to 12 hours. You get style and substance, fashion and function. The design eliminates condensation and water build-up so taking these travel bottles on the go is easy and mess free—no water rings or slippery hands
LEAKPROOF & SCRATCH RESISTANT: An airtight seal eliminates accidental spills and maintains a leak-proof drinking bottle— innovative cap design with the leakproof flip straw allows easy one-handed drinking while the BPA-free silicone rubber ensures no leak even if it is tipped over or shaken. Put the vacuum thermo flask in your bag freely without worrying about wetting other items. Anti-slip, scratch-resistant and toxin-free, making these reusable water bottles a healthy choice
FUNCTIONAL DESIGN METAL WATER BOTTLE: Rust-resistant, food grade stainless steel water bottle; metal construction inside and out for long-lasting, fresh tasting flavour, includes an airtight, leak-proof top lid with a sip valve and a removable straw that is ideal for running, cycling, sports, yoga, hiking, fishing, travel and more. BPA free for healthy drinking, toxin free material for a pure taste. With so many striking colours on offer, you will stand out from the crowd.
FOR THE ENVIRONMENT’S SAKE: With our reusable and durable water bottle, you will actively protect our environment from the dangers of single-use plastic bottle and help to reduce garbage production. For 8 glasses of water a day, bottled water costs £1,400 a year. Using a reusable bottle, which on average costs £20 would save you £1,380 per year!

Colour Turquoise
Material Eastman Tritan
Capacity 750 Millilitres
Brand Polar Gear
ENCOURAGE YOURSELF TO DRINK MORE WATER: Polar Gear’s Water Tracker Bottle with detachable straw is great to keep you hydrated. Available in bright pink/berry, mint green, navy blue, dusty pink and black with inspiring motivational messages that serve as a reminder to stay on track for drinking with handy hourly markers down the side of the bottle. This bottle will help you to stay healthy and quench your thirst. Each design is different, so grab one for all the family to keep cool this year!
A SMART BOTTLE YOU'LL NEVER LOSE: It’s only too easy to leave your bottle somewhere when you're busy. Use the integrated carry hoop to hook onto your bag and never lose your water bottle again. Our flip-up straw opens with one finger, so it's easy to sip when working out or driving. You don't have to tip your head back when sipping due to the smart air valve, so this bottle is great for keeping safe and not losing focus. Flip the straw to close the secure silicone seal lid and prevent spillage.
HYDRATE WITH YOUR FAVOURITE DRINK: The extra-wide neck and screw top makes for easy filling, cleaning and emptying of your drinks bottle; whether you add ice cubes, water, or even fruit, this water tracker bottle has the capacity for it all. Great gift idea for keeping your loved ones cool and hydrated, and with no plastic taste, the BPA free bottle makes sure whatever drink you have tastes fresh.
UBER FUNCTIONAL: Super lightweight with a detachable internal straw, you can pop in the drink of your choice and away you go. The bottle fits into most standard bike and car drink holders. Safer and less breakable than glass bottles, this 750ml capacity bottle is made of Tritan (sturdy washable polypropylene plastic) and is perfect for reaching your daily hydration goals whether you are going to the gym, doing yoga, travelling or even relaxing in the hot tub.
ECO-FRIENDLY & REUSABLE: Save the equivalent of 1460 plastic water bottles from getting tossed into a landfill by coaching the next generation into using a reusable water bottle. Helping the planet has never been so easy… or this shade of blue!

A SMART BOTTLE YOU'LL NEVER LOSE: It’s only too easy to leave your bottle somewhere when you're busy. Use the integrated carry hoop to hook onto your bag and never lose your water bottle again. Our flip-up straw opens with one finger, so it's easy to sip when working out or driving. You don't have to tip your head back when sipping due to the smart air valve, so this bottle is great for keeping safe and not losing focus. Flip the straw to close the secure silicone seal lid and prevent spillage.
HYDRATE WITH YOUR FAVOURITE DRINK: The extra-wide neck and screw top makes for easy filling, cleaning and emptying of your drinks bottle; whether you add ice cubes, water, or even fruit, this water tracker bottle has the capacity for it all. Great gift idea for keeping your loved ones cool and hydrated, and with no plastic taste, the BPA free bottle makes sure whatever drink you have tastes fresh.
UBER FUNCTIONAL: Super lightweight with a detachable internal straw, you can pop in the drink of your choice and away you go. The bottle fits into most standard bike and car drink holders. Safer and less breakable than glass bottles, this 750ml capacity bottle is made of Tritan (sturdy washable polypropylene plastic) and is perfect for reaching your daily hydration goals whether you are going to the gym, doing yoga, travelling or even relaxing in the hot tub.
ECO-FRIENDLY & REUSABLE: Save the equivalent of 1460 plastic water bottles from getting tossed into a landfill by coaching the next generation into using a reusable water bottle. Helping the planet has never been so easy… or this shade of blue!

iglu Bottles | Premium Double Walled Stainless Steel | Vacuum Insulated Reusable Water Bottle |12 Hours Hot & 24 Hours Cold | Sweatproof & BPA Free Flask | Great His & Her Gift (Sea Salt, 500ml)
PREMIUM MATERIALS - your iglu is constructed using durable and premium stainless steel ensuring your drinks stays fresh and flavoursome wherever you are. Combining 18/8 stainless steel with modern airtight vacuum technology means your iglu will keep your drink hot or cold for hours on end (cold for up to 24 hours or hot for up to 12 hours).
CURVACEOUS DESIGN - we love incorporating curves into iglu designs, from our coffee cups to our food pots it makes for beautiful designs and allows your iglus to have a larger capacity in a smaller form factor. Being slightly wider at the hips the iglu bottle is shorter in height making it great for fitting in sports bags, handbags and having a snug fit in your cup holder making it much less likely to tip over.
TAKE IT EVERYWHERE - compact, lightweight and sweatproof makes your iglu great for adults and kids alike. Ideal for travelling, being your gym companion or having fun in the sun with friends and family. Your iglu is leakproof and easy to clean so you don’t have to worry about when it’s time for a wash.
ACCESSORIES - BPA Free, fun and colourful silicone handles (coming soon) allow you to easily accessorise and personalise your iglu, making it a great gift and addition to your growing iglu family.
WHY IGLU? We’re an independent family business, based in the UK. At the heart of everything we do is having fun and building relationships. We strive for excellence but if we don’t get it right we always treat our customers like friends and family to put it right. If you need support, click the feedback button on your order or take a look on the bottom of your iglu and contact us there.

Input:
Involve & Evolve Insulated Water Bottle with 3 Lids (Straw Lid) Kids Reusable Double Walled Stainless Steel Flask Thermos 350ml 500ml 600ml 750ml
Colour Black
Material Stainless Steel
Capacity 340 Grams
Brand Involve & Evolve
DOUBLE WALLED VACUUM INSULATED: Our 12oz / 17 oz / 20 oz / 25 oz high quality reusable vacuum insulated water bottles work great as a thermos, keeping your drinks cold up to 24h and hot up to 12h. Our double wall construction is specially designed to prevent condensation from forming on the outside of the bottle.
BPA FREE STRAW LID / SPORTS TOP + LEAK PROOF STAINLESS STEEL SCREW ON CAP: Each water bottle comes with a 100% leak proof, food grade 18/8 stainless steel cap, an interchangeable BPA/PVC free push pull sports cap as well as straw lid with straw. We included 2 straws for the straw lid for your convenience. If you encounter any difficulties with your lids (or order), please contact us at getinvolveandevolve@gmail.com and we will send you a replacement lid on our expense.
LIGHTWEIGHT & NO SWEAT WATER BOTTLE: The design of our water bottle makes it perfect to take anywhere, whether to your office, school, gym, yoga class, or while you are out for any outdoor activities such as biking, running, hiking, backpacking, or camping. In contrast to your body, after intense training, the bottle never sweats :) Additionally, the 12 oz, 17 oz and 20 oz flasks fit standard sized cup holders, which make them ideal for long drives and travel.
18/8 FOOD GRADE STAINLESS STEEL: Each flask is made of high quality food grade 18/8 stainless steel (304 stainless steel). Unlike many other low quality steel, aluminum, or plastic bottles, our 18/8 stainless steel bottles will not leach out any metal taste into your beverage and will leave your water odor free. The cantines are completely safe to drink and non toxic.
POWDER COATED & DURABLE FINISH: Our stylish and durable powder coating gives your bottle extra protection from chipping and scratches. Each thermal bottle is not only durable, but also very chic and classy! Inspirational and unique designs on the bottles make them perfectly suited for women and men, adults, teens and kids. They are also a great gift idea!

【18/10 Stainless Steel】OMORC double-wall vacuum insulated water bottle is crafted with 18/10 stainless steel liner to provide better corrosion resistance, oxidation resistance, rust resistance, temperature retention and water scaling prevention than ordinary 18/8 stainless steel, keeping the pure taste of your beverages to the last drop. BPA-free straw lid and flex cap with portable handle are easy to carry for various outdoor activities. The bottle pouch with adjustable belt is built for hands-free carrying and added bottle protection.
【100% Satisfaction Guarantee】OMORC stainless steel water bottle provides perfect solution to everyday refreshment and healthy hydration. You will get 1 40oz insulated water bottle, 1 portable pouch, 2 lids, 2 straws, 1 bottle brush and 1 straw brush. We offer 1-year warranty and lifetime service for no-risk experience. EVIoX Glass Water Bottle 750mls Eco Friendly Sports Bottles + FREE Introduction to Intermittent Fasting E-book | Drinks Bottle Plastic Free Bottled Water Non Plastic Cool Stylish Gym Shaker Bottles
Colour Black and Transparent
Material Glass, Plastic
Brand EVIoX
✔ Still using plastic? PLEASE DON'T! Recent research adds onto growing evidence that BPA-free alternatives such as BPS, BPF or BPAF may not be as safe as expected. Also, plastic and their byproducts are one of the biggest ecologic ongoing problems of our time. A great alternative is glass.
✔BOROSILICATE GLASS - Our bottles are made of resistent Borosilicate glass. Borosilicate glass resists chemicals and acid degradation, you don't need to worry about stuff seeping into your water. It's always safe to drink from.
✔ BOROSILICATE GLASSES are known for having very low coefficients of thermal expansion making them resistant to thermal shock, more so than any other common glass. OUR BOTTLES ARE SUPER RESISTENT. IDEAL FOR GYM AND OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES.
✔ STAINLESS STEEL MIXER BALL - This mixer ball acts like a small whisk when placed in a shaker bottle and then shaken. This is ideal if you want to mix protein powder, Amino acids such as BCAA's or generally any type of powder.
✔ INTRODUCTION TO INTERMITTENT FASTING (IF) E-BOOK - Our hunter-gatherer ancestors fasted whenever food was in short supply. In the las few years IF has emerged as a powerful tool to loose weight/body fat, improve cognition and general well being. Our IF book acts as a introduction to IF. We will E-MAIL YOU THE BOOK AFTER THE PURCHASE.

Colour Unicorn Purple
Material Stainless Steel
Capacity 350 Millilitres
Brand Onegreenbottle
Keeps Your Drink Pure and Secure – This tough water bottle uses toxin-free components without Bpa or Bps. It’s non-leaching, so no chemicals seep into the liquid. You don’t have to worry about any odour or metal taste.
Stylish, Robust, and Rugged – Our curvy sports bottle is made with the highest quality food-grade 304 (18/8) stainless steel. Durable and well-made, it’s your reliable 350ml stainless steel bottle/500ml metal bottle for everyday use.
No Messy Spills - Because this curved stainless steel bottle is leak-proof, it never spills. Just make sure that the cap of your leakproof bottle is tightly closed before you head out.
With Improved Sports Cap for Better Flow – The classic cap of your curvy 500ml water bottles let liquid flow faster. So, you can drink or pour conveniently. You can replace it with any of our classic canteen cap variants (sold separately).
Durable Metal Water Bottle for Your Active Lifestyle - Our stainless sports water bottles are shock-proof and scratch-resistant, making them ideal for indoor and outdoor use.

Insulated Water Bottle,Double Walled Vacuum Flask,450ml Stainless Steel Insulated Water Bottle, Flask for Yoga, Gym and Sports,Car Coffee, Fitness,Camping(White)
【Safe Material 】 This high quality stainless steel sports bottle, elegant and durable, is BPA free, non-toxic, tasteless, safe and healthy, and does not break easily.It is a healthier choice as water bottle for tea, coffee, cold drink with ice cubes, etc.
【Double-walled design】 Double wall insulation maintains stainless steel design keeps the cool for 12 hours and hot drinks for 6 hours to prevent perspiration or condensation. It has a longer production and service life and is better than plastic or cans. Insulated water bottles are an ideal gift for family or friends.
【Advanced design】 This ergonomically shaped vacuum insulated bottle allows one-handed operation by briefly releasing and pressing the side button, fits most cup holders and makes a perfect travel companion; Perfectly suitable for daily use, running, hiking, and camping
【Leak proof】Double lid locks of bottle and silicone rubbers ensure no leak even the water bottle is tipped over or shaken; Coated with high-quality powder outside, this drink flask is anti-slip andoutstanding insulation, no matter the temperature of the liquid in this bottle, it will never sweat or be hot to the touch
【Widely used】Our bottles are available in different colors and suitable for everyday use. This Thermal Bottle is lightweight and wear resistant. Don't worry about spilled material when you throw it in your backpack or back seat. They are also suitable for a variety of places ， hiking, sports, yoga, beach, fitness, office.
